summary: Full Stack Developer specialized in high-performance web applications and algorithmic logic. Proven experience in developing and commercializing complex software solutions for data analysis and risk management.
about:
Full Stack Developer and Data Analyst with over 6 years of experience. I specialize in building scalable web applications and implementing complex algorithmic logic. I combine strong foundational knowledge in data structures with a modern, high-performance stack (React, Node.js, Python). I actively integrate advanced AI tools into my workflow.

*Note: Since my projects are commercial products (proprietary software), the source code is hosted in private repositories. However, I am happy to provide code walkthroughs and live demonstrations of the platforms during an interview.*

details: React, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion
Node.js, PostgreSQL, Supabase, SQL, Stripe, Cloudflare Stream
Visual Studio Code, GitHub, Git Version Control
Workflow Optimization with LLMs (Claude, Gemini, Copilot)
C, C++, Java, PHP, SQL, Data Structures

experience.description: Architected and built a scalable Video-on-Demand platform featuring automated subscription billing (Stripe), secure high-quality video streaming (Cloudflare), and a custom course progression system. Managed the full lifecycle from design to deployment. (Live Commercial Product - Demo Available upon Request)
experience.stack: React, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS, PostgreSQL, Stripe, Resend.

experience.description: Engineered and commercialized a sophisticated desktop application for elite-level Game Theory (GTO) study. The software provides deep analysis capabilities and a visual grid editor for constructing complex mixed strategies, utilized by professional players for off-table optimization. (Private Repo - Commercial Product)
experience.stack: Python, Tkinter (GUI), JSON, Algorithmic Logic, Statistics.

experience.description: Designed and sold bespoke mathematical bankroll management systems. Utilized solvers and multi-terabyte databases to predict Equity, EV, and risk, enabling clients to optimize their investment strategies.
experience.stack: SQL, Big Data, Statistics & Probability, Solvers.

education.description: Graduated from the National Technological University (UTN), Argentina.
Constant research and application of AI technologies for software engineering (LLMs, Code Optimization).
